title: The Leftovers
creator_credit: John Paino, John Blair, Carly Wray and Warner Bros. Television
brief_description: When 2% of the world’s population abruptly disappears without explanation, the world struggles to understand just what they’re supposed to do about it. The drama series The Leftovers is the story of the people who didn’t make the cut.

constellations_other.name: The world's end
constellations_other.description: For people of colour oppressed by systemic racism, genre stories about the end of the world and cosmological monsters can be used to re-examine race and the injustices faced in real life.

creator_credit_for_label: John Paino, John Blair, Carly Wray and Warner Bros. Television
description:
When 2% of the world’s population abruptly disappears without explanation, the world struggles to understand just what they’re supposed to do about it. The drama series ‘The Leftovers’ is the story of the people who didn’t make the cut.

Based on the bestselling novel by Tom Perrotta, ‘The Leftovers’ follows Kevin Garvey, a father of two and the chief of police in a small New York suburb, as he tries to maintain some semblance of normalcy when the notion no longer applies.
